Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization

Interface Summary
JSONSerialization Basic json serialization support using a Json SerializerBuilder.
NoRootSerialization Creates a serializer of a given format with out ROOT alias.
ProxyInitializer Initializer of proxfied objets.
RepresentationResult Chooses a serializer to serialize an object.
Serialization Creates a serializer of a given format.
Serializer Serializes given object, including and excluding fields.
SerializerBuilder SerializerBuilder used on internal API to build a Serializer object.
XMLConfiguration Basic xml configuration for xml serialization.
XMLSerialization Basic xml serialization support using a xml BasicSerializer.
 

Class Summary
DefaultRepresentationResult Default implementation for RepresentationResult that uses request Accept format to decide which representation will be used
DefaultXMLConfiguration Basic xml configuration for xml serialization.
HibernateProxyInitializer Initializer for Hibernate proxy objects
HTMLSerialization  
IgnoringSerializer Doesn't serialize anything
NullProxyInitializer ProxyInitializer that does nothing.
 

Exception Summary
SerializationException Representation of problems during serialization
